review_blob: Very good mouth feel. Right amount of bitterness. Very drinkablebeer. One of my favorites.

I am not normally a Pilsener fan but this beer was very enjoyable. I could pick up very little aroma. The appearance was about right for a Pilsener. It had a grassy flavor that was pleasing to the palate and finished with a lasting hoppy taste that created a desire to repeat. Overall I found this beer very enjoyable and recommend it.

This is a very respectable beer but a little weak on the palate to suit my taste for lager. It has excellent color but I prefer a more hoppy lager with a stonger aroma and flavor. It starts out and finishes smooth with moderate flavor. There was not a noticeable change as it travels across the tongue and it finishes with a mild to moderate impact.
